entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
